titleStmt.title: The Marquess of Argyle his petition to the parliament of Scotland; craving a precognition of his case, containing many weighty reasons urging the necessity thereof. / Presented to the parliament, February 12, 1661.
titleStmt.author: Argyll, Archibald Campbell, Marquis of, 1598-1661.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: British Library.
